mapper.select: SELECT tb.userid,t_user.nickname as username, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM bb_question WHERE userId = tb.userId AND STATUS ='2') questionDisableCnt, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM bb_question_answer WHERE userId = tb.userId AND STATUS = '2'AND parentId ='') answerDisableCnt, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM bb_question_answer WHERE userId = tb.userId AND STATUS = '2'AND parentId !='') commentDisableCnt , IF(t_disable_user.userId IS NULL, FALSE, TRUE) isDisable FROM (SELECT DISTINCT(userId) FROM bb_question UNION SELECT DISTINCT(userId) FROM bb_question_answer) AS tb JOIN abc12366_uc.uc_user t_user ON t_user.id = tb.userId LEFT JOIN bb_question_disable_user t_disable_user ON tb.userId= t_disable_user.userId AND t_disable_user.activeTime > NOW()
